entities.name: voldemort

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the scene and is being examined by the woman.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as a character who may be alive or dead.

entities.name: narcissa malfoy
entities.description: Narcissa Malfoy is the one who announces that Draco is dead.

entities.name: the woman
entities.description: The woman is examining Harry and has long hair.

relationships.description: Voldemort is wary of approaching Harry.
The woman is examining Harry's face, eyelid, and chest.
Narcissa Malfoy announces that Draco is dead.
The woman can feel the steady pounding of Harry's heart.
Draco is a target of Voldemort's plans.
